title: World’s largest clinical trial on aspirin to stop cancer returning launches today (Cancer Research UK) ...
text: ( Source : Cancer Research UK ) The world 's largest ever clinical trial looking at whether taking aspirin every day stops some of the most common cancers coming back, launches across the UK today. 'This trial is especially exciting as cancers
